alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 8:32PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Jefferson and north central Deschutes Counties through 900 PM PDT... At 831 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Terrebonne, or 9 miles northwest of Redmond, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Redmond and Terrebonne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon; East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
